text: læa ma la xik ah di reiyk khea khna thi khea kalang yun lahmad xyu nı xal mih rxb wa thæ cring xallxh thrng cæng khawdi kæ than dwy yah ya doythi ca pen phu yunyan phcman hnung ca kxallxh læa ca pen phuna læa phu raksʹa wi sung khwam brisuththi læa pen na bi khn hnung cak hmu chn thi pen khn di
